activation.condition: Foe in adjacent space is larger than you are.

description.value:
You use your small size against larger foes.

Prerequisites: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.j1zs1Wf9KoIg8jti]{Scurry}, Acrobatics 10 ranks, racial bonus to Dexterity, size Small.

Benefit: As a move action, you can try to slip into the space of an adjacent foe larger than you are. To do so, attempt an Acrobatics check (DC = 15 + 1-1/2 × opponent’s CR). If you succeed, you enter your opponent’s space. If you fail, you remain in your starting position, and you are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-footed} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.yUtkoIshf4dPruNd]{Off-Target} until the end of your next turn.

While you occupy a foe’s space, that foe is @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-footed} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.yUtkoIshf4dPruNd]{Off-Target}. If your opponent tries to move out of your space, it provokes an attack of opportunity from you.
